A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm not a bot or a hacker\, or anything else that outlets are trying to say why this movie has such a low audience rating.

I'm a real person.

And As a die hard who camped out for 3 weeks time in front of the big Newport theater to see episode I in 1999\, I thought the last Jedi was the worst Star Wars movie I've ever seen and a pristine example of $ & profit influencing a cinematic lore & universe that stands against those very concepts

In my opinion\, it's not only the worst Star Wars movie\, but just an awful piece of film making\, with no direction & so many hack jokes intended for a pop culture target audience of those who prefer a cheap laugh rather than a good story.

Again\, this is just my opinion as a long time fan with Star Wars tatoos and an un-Dying love for the original saga\, pre - 7 & 8

I was SO excited for it & wanted to like it\, but walked out depressed & severely disappointed.
